p.small: The tarball includes all the JARs required by Castor. To fully install Castor, simply extract all the JARs into the classpath.
The CVS snapshot includes additional JARs required to build Castor. It is self sufficient and does not require any external components, except for javac.
All the JARs included with Castor and used for building Castor are available for distribution free of charge and without restriction, subject to US export regulation.

All implementation JARs (i.e. non APIs) are available under an open source license and available from our FTP server or other sources. License in use include ASF, Exolab, MPL, and public domain. All these licenses are fully compatible with each other.
